content: IPO clearly is a good tool to give value and independence to the company, but the strategic move is Plenitude itself because it's functional to our aim to sell the carbonized product â green, blue and biogas â to our client to reach the net zero in our Scope 3. So, I think that, if you look at the overall performance of Eni in 2022, first of all, in managing a risk that is huge, in finding new source of supply that ensures Italy, in particular, to have, let's say, a better condition so far versus other European countries in terms of security of supply.
